targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t,ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host,  max(Value) Used 
FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND MetricName = 'instance_cpu_usage_system'
GROUP BY t, host
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) as t,ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host,  max(Value) Used 
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752740840,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752742640,3) 
AND MetricName = 'instance_cpu_usage_system'
GROUP BY t, host

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
   $timeSeries as t, 
    ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host,
    max(Value),
FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND MetricName = 'system.network.connections'  
    AND Attributes['protocol'] = 'tcp'
    AND Attributes['state'] = 'ESTABLISHED'
GROUP BY host, t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT
   (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) as t, 
    ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host,
    max(Value),
FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752740840,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752742640,3)
    AND MetricName = 'system.network.connections'  
    AND Attributes['protocol'] = 'tcp'
    AND Attributes['state'] = 'ESTABLISHED'
GROUP BY host, t

panels.description: Physical RAM actively in use by applications and system processes. Excludes easily reclaimable cache memory.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) as t,ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host,  max(Value) Used 
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752740840,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752742640,3) 
AND MetricName = 'instance_memory_utilization' 
GROUP BY t, host

panels.title: Memory Usage

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, max(Value) LoadAvg15Min 
FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'system.cpu.load_average.15m' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] ='$host'
GROUP BY t 
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) as t, max(Value) LoadAvg15Min 
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3)
AND MetricName = 'system.cpu.load_average.15m' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] ='i-0fd3a57095204b2ba'
GROUP BY t 
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, max(Value) Used
FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND MetricName = 'system.memory.usage' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}
AND Attributes['state'] = 'used'
GROUP BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
ORDER BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) as t, max(Value) Used
FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) 
AND MetricName = 'system.memory.usage' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = 'i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8'
AND Attributes['state'] = 'used'
GROUP BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
ORDER BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, max(Value) Cached
FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND MetricName = 'system.memory.usage' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] in (${host:singlequote})
AND Attributes['state'] = 'cached'
GROUP BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
ORDER BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) as t, max(Value) Cached
FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) 
AND MetricName = 'system.memory.usage' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] in ('i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8')
AND Attributes['state'] = 'cached'
GROUP BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
ORDER BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

SELECT $timeSeries as t, max(Value) Free
FROM $table

AND MetricName = 'system.memory.usage' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] in (${host:singlequote})
AND Attributes['state'] = 'free'
GROUP BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']

targets.rawQuery:

AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] in ('i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8')
AND Attributes['state'] = 'free'
GROUP BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']
ORDER BY t, ResourceAttributes['host.id']

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(Attributes['device'] device, anyLast(Value) c) 
from $table 
where $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'system.filesystem.usage'
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}
AND Attributes['state'] = 'free'
GROUP BY t, device
ORDER BY t, device
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT t, groupArray((device, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, Attributes['device'] device, anyLast(Value) c from base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) AND TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3)
AND MetricName = 'system.filesystem.usage'
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = 'i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8'
AND Attributes['state'] = 'free' GROUP BY t, device ORDER BY t, device) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(Attributes['device'] device, anyLast(Value) c) 
from $table 
where $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'system.filesystem.usage'
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}
AND Attributes['state'] = 'used'
GROUP BY t, device
ORDER BY t, device
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT t, groupArray((device, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, Attributes['device'] device, anyLast(Value) c from base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) AND TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3)
AND MetricName = 'system.filesystem.usage'
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = 'i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8'
AND Attributes['state'] = 'used' GROUP BY t, device ORDER BY t, device) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(Attributes['device'] device, anyLast(Value) c) 
from $table 
where $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'system.filesystem.usage'
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}
AND Attributes['state'] = 'reserved'
GROUP BY t, device
ORDER BY t, device
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT t, groupArray((device, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, Attributes['device'] device, anyLast(Value) c from base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) AND TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3)
AND MetricName = 'system.filesystem.usage'
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = 'i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8'
AND Attributes['state'] = 'reserved' GROUP BY t, device ORDER BY t, device) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(Attributes['state'] state, anyLastIf(Value, Attributes['protocol'] == 'tcp') c) 
from $table 
where $timeFilter
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}
AND MetricName = 'system.network.connections' 
GROUP BY t, state
ORDER BY t, state
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT t, groupArray((state, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) AS t, Attributes['state'] state, anyLastIf(Value, Attributes['protocol'] == 'tcp') c from base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) AND TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3)
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = 'i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8'
AND MetricName = 'system.network.connections'  GROUP BY t, state ORDER BY t, state) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(Attributes['device'] device, anyLastIf(Value, Attributes['direction'] == 'receive') c) 
from $table 
where $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'system.network.io' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}
GROUP BY t, device
ORDER BY t, device
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT t, groupArray((device, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (1 * 1000)) * (1 * 1000)) AS t, Attributes['device'] device, anyLastIf(Value, Attributes['direction'] == 'receive') c from base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3) AND TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752733531,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752735331,3)
AND MetricName = 'system.network.io' 
AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = 'i-0ebf0d72e0e005cf8' GROUP BY t, device ORDER BY t, device) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$perSecond(Value) from $table where $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'system.processes.created'  AND ResourceAttributes['host.id'] = ${host:singlequote}

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host
FROM $table 
WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
ORDER BY host
list.label: Host
list.name: host

query.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
query.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host
FROM $table 
WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
ORDER BY host
query.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Host Metrics', user='3' */
SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['host.id'] as host
FROM base14.otel_metrics_sum 
WHERE TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
ORDER BY host
